extendedInfo.description: FlashApp allows you to power-on the Camera LED of the HTC Desire and My-Touch slide.Two levels of power :- "flash" for a short time, but a full power light- "on" for a long time, but little power lightwork only on Desire.if sign problem, please uninstall and reinstallupdate:-new application icon (thanks to Pr0sper)

reviews.comment: Lol @ the non desire users giving app a bad rating. IT\'S ONLY AVAILABLE FOR THE DESIRE ATM! Great app anyway. Wish flash was longer but not possible?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works just fine with no need to risk rooting device. Has Hi/Lo intensity, but Hi only runs for 1 sec burst, presumably to safeguard led. Recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does exactly what I want. On/off widget would be very appreciated and worth 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only one I\'ve found to work for EVO so I\'m happy but would like brighter in on mode
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works perfectly on my HTC desire! Only wish would be longer full power or option to switch to half power automatically once the full is over.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it says. I wonder if you could get that short bright flash to last longer. Or is it some kind of protection?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hi great app use it all the time its never let me down thanks Gerry
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: GREAT APP! Just wish the brighter flash would stay like that when clicked \"ON\" Please update!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works fine on HTC Desire. Brighter flash would be better if it stayed on longer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome on mytouch slide! Like others said pls add option for more brightness Thanks for this app!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app but it will be even better that it has full light in longer time ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great on TMo MyTouch Slide! Simple and to the point.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very handy, is it possible to have full power at all times.?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Are you all stupid? It says desire and mytouch! Fools!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great that it works at all, but locking the screen so you dont have light in your face switches off the flash!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works good wish you could have an option when you turn it \"on\" to have full brightness
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great! Can\'t wait to see some updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app. Works on EVO. Add screen off and slider control for 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Small file size and its working fine!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works on evo. Even tho it would reduce bat life a lil quicker, it wud b sweet to have it on flash power at all times instead of a split sec @ a time
reviews.author: A Google User
